raw_json.html_title: New book ‘C++ for R Users’ and all my other books for free or 10 USD each | R-bloggers
raw_json.main_html:
New book ‘C++ for R Users’ and all my other books for free or 10 USD each

Posted on August 11, 2025 by pacha.dev/blog in R bloggers | 0 Comments

[This article was first published on pacha.dev/blog, and kindly contributed to R-bloggers]. (You can report issue about the content on this page here)
Want to share your content on R-bloggers? click here if you have a blog, or here if you don't.

In line with my previous post, I have decided to release a premilinary edition of ‘C++ for R Users’. The suggested price is 10 USD, these can be downloaded for free, and the offer will last while my scholarship payments are still delayed (it’s been almost three months).

Books:

  1. C++ for R Users
  2. The Hitchhiker’s Guide to Linear Models
  3. The Hitchhiker’s Guide to ggplot2
  4. The Hitchhiker’s Guide to plotnine

Related

To leave a comment for the author, please follow the link and comment on their blog: pacha.dev/blog.
R-bloggers.com offers daily e-mail updates about R news and tutorials about learning R and many other topics. Click here if you're looking to post or find an R/data-science job.
